name: Conciliation
description: Calm, soothe, or mollify a hostile spirit or beast.

name: Cultivation
description: Calm, soothe, or mollify a hostile spirit or beast.

name: Preservation
description: Convince others to protect something of natural beauty or of importance to Danu.

name: Renewal
description: Restore someone or thing to its prior, untainted state, or defeat a perversion of the natural order.

name: Conscience
description: Forego comfort or advantage to do the right thing.

name: Excitement
description: Cause an ally trouble by taking an unnecessary risk.

name: Glory
description: Show off in front of NPCs who will tell your tale.

name: Romance
description: Get intimate with someone you’re attracted to.

name: Trickery
description: Get someone or thing to act on false information.

name: Challenge
description: Provoke a fight with a worthy foe, just you & them.

name: Honor
description: Fullfill a vow or oath made to an NPC.

name: Peace
description: Prevent violence or end it without hurting anyone.

name: Pride
description: Put someone in their place.

name: Duty
description: Cause trouble by adhering strictly to doctrine.

name: Harmony
description: Settle a dispute without anyone feeling wronged.

name: Knowledge
description: Teach another something important.

name: Zeal
description: Pass judgement hastily, without considering nuance or consequences.

name: Charity
description: Bring relief or comfort to someone who is suffering.

name: Faith
description: Walk brazenly into danger, sure of Helior’s plan.

name: Hope
description: Lead another to act despite fear or doubt.

name: Mercy
description: Forgive a wrong or set a helpless enemy free.

name: Honor
description: Keep a promise you made to an NPC.

name: Prestige
description: Impress an NPC from outside your home steading.

name: Resolve
description: Give an order or enact a plan knowing it will bring an ally to harm.

name: Ruthlessness
description: Deny mercy to an enemy or betray a supposed ally.

name: Mercy
description: Release someone/thing from bondage or suffering.

name: Stewardship
description: Put the best interests of a place or beast over a person’s desires.

name: Tenacity
description: Refuse to turn back despite objection or disaster.

name: Wonder
description: Show someone a place or thing of beauty.

name: Cunning
description: Set up a ploy and then take advantage of it.

name: Curiosity
description: Cause trouble by touching, opening, or tinkering with something.

name: Respect
description: Impress another with your superior knowledge.

name: Secrecy
description: Deflect or evade an inquiry into your doings.

name: Victory
description: Endanger others in order to defeat the supernatural.

name: Bravery
description: Face up to one of your fears.

name: Glory
description: Impress onlookers with your bravery.

name: Sacrifice
description: Suffer or endure hardship so that someone else does not need to do so.

name: Succor
description: Provide aid or comfort to an NPC in need.
